name: Mankind Manager
description:
Mankind Manager is a game where you can control the decisions of a god, and a mayor at the same time. As a god, you can create animal life and trees, as a mayor, you can command your citzens to do what you want!

Game Controls: Mainly uses mouse, hold "R" for two seconds and you restart the game.

Theme Interpretation: My giftee asked me for a game about perspective change, where the world keeps the same, but you see as a different one. My first idea was a game about changing the main character, but it wasn't fun at all, so I managed to create this little game in the period of 5 days.
